com.comphenix.xp.history

Class HistoryProviders

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.extra.ServiceProvider<HistoryService>
      • com.comphenix.xp.history.HistoryProviders

  • public class HistoryProviders
extends ServiceProvider<HistoryService>
    Registry of history (block change logging) providers.

    The default service setting is ignored.

    Author:
    Kristian

      • getMemoryService

        public MemoryService getMemoryService()

      • hasPlayerHistory

        public java.lang.Boolean hasPlayerHistory(org.bukkit.Location block,
                                 boolean acceptGuesses,
                                 Debugger debugger)
        Determines whether or not a block has been placed by a player, using the registered service providers in order of lookup speed.

        If no service provider could accurately answer the query, the function returns NULL.

        Parameters:
        block - - block to search for.
        acceptGuesses - - whether or not probabilistic answers are acceptable.
        debugger - - debugger that handles errors produced by any history service.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the block was placed by a player, FALSE if it was generated naturally, or NULL if unknown.

      • hasPlayerHistory

        public java.lang.Boolean hasPlayerHistory(org.bukkit.Location block,
                                 boolean acceptGuesses,
                                 ErrorHandler<java.lang.Exception> errorHandler)
        Determines whether or not a block has been placed by a player, using the registered service providers in order of lookup speed.

        If no service provider could accurately answer the query, the function returns NULL.

        Parameters:
        block - - block to search for.
        acceptGuesses - - whether or not probabilistic answers are acceptable.
        errorHandler - - reports errors from individual history services.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the block was placed by a player, FALSE if it was generated naturally, or NULL if unknown.

        public HistoryService unregister(HistoryService service)
        Description copied from class: ServiceProvider
        Unregisters a particular service.
        Overrides:
        unregister in class ServiceProvider<HistoryService>
        Parameters:
        service - - the service to unregister.
        Returns:
        The service that was unregistered, or NULL if this service has already been unregistered.
